summary: This is an email forwarding a digital forensic timeline report from the DOJ OIG Cyber team regarding two computers retrieved from the SHU (Special Housing Unit). The sender expresses dissatisfaction and requests copies of documents opened by an individual named Thomas at the beginning of his shift.

persons.name: Thomas
persons.role: Individual who accessed documents at beginning of shift
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who opened documents at the beginning of his shift; the email sender wants copies of those documents.

events.title: Email forwarding digital forensic report
events.description: An email is sent forwarding a timeline report of a digital forensic analysis conducted by the DOJ OIG Cyber team on two computers from the SHU.

locations.name: SHU (Special Housing Unit)
locations.context: Location where two computers were retrieved from for digital forensic analysis.

locations.name: U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General New York Field Office
locations.context: Office located at One Battery Park Plaza, 29th Floor, New York, NY 10004, mentioned as the source of the report.

locations.name: One Battery Park Plaza, 29th Floor, New York, NY 10004
locations.context: Address of the DOJ OIG New York Field Office.

keyFacts: A digital forensic timeline report was conducted by the DOJ OIG Cyber team on two computers retrieved from the SHU.
The email sender is dissatisfied and specifically requests copies of documents that 'Thomas' opened at the beginning of his shift.
The document is an internal email correspondence dated September 25, 2019, related to an ongoing investigation.
